ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestModule.label: Default test module
TestModule.description: This is the default test module

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'CI_Address' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_ScopeDescription' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The type with localName 'MD_ScopeDescription' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' must contain one and only one of the following options:
  • features
  • attributeInstances
  • other
  • featureInstances
  • dataset

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_Metadata' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The type with localName 'MD_Metadata' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should be present in the file

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_Metadata' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'id' and namespace 'null' should not be empty if it's present
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $propertiesFound := $record//*[local-name()='MD_Metadata' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='id'] for $propertyFound in $propertiesFound return if (functx:all-whitespace($propertyFound)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingTypeContentError', map { 'localName': 'id', 'namespace': 'null' }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_Metadata' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The property with localName 'hierarchyLevel' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a value that corresponds to one from the following list:
  • software
  • nonGeographicDataset
  • collectionHardware
  • fieldSession
  • feature
  • dimensionGroup
  • collectionSession
  • attributeType
  • series
  • service
  • propertyType
  • featureType
  • tile
  • model
  • attribute
  • dataset
TestAssertion.expression: let $codes := ('software', 'nonGeographicDataset', 'collectionHardware', 'fieldSession', 'feature', 'dimensionGroup', 'collectionSession', 'attributeType', 'series', 'service', 'propertyType', 'featureType', 'tile', 'model', 'attribute', 'dataset') let $messages := (for $record in $db let $typesFound := $record//*[local-name()='MD_Metadata' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $typeFound in $typesFound let $propertyFound := $typeFound/*[local-name()='hierarchyLevel' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] return if ($propertyFound and not($propertyFound/text() = $codes)) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidPropertyValueError', map { 'propName': 'hierarchyLevel', 'localName': 'MD_Metadata', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'valueFound': $propertyFound/text(), 'allowedValues': string-join( $codes, ', ') }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'PT_Locale' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'id' and namespace 'null' should not be empty if it's present
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $propertiesFound := $record//*[local-name()='PT_Locale' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='id'] for $propertyFound in $propertiesFound return if (functx:all-whitespace($propertyFound)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingTypeContentError', map { 'localName': 'id', 'namespace': 'null' }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'AbstractDQ_Element' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The property with localName 'evaluationMethodType' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a value that corresponds to one from the following list:
  • indirect
  • directExternal
  • directInternal
TestAssertion.expression: let $codes := ('indirect', 'directExternal', 'directInternal') let $messages := (for $record in $db let $typesFound := $record//*[local-name()='AbstractDQ_Element' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $typeFound in $typesFound let $propertyFound := $typeFound/*[local-name()='evaluationMethodType' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] return if ($propertyFound and not($propertyFound/text() = $codes)) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidPropertyValueError', map { 'propName': 'evaluationMethodType', 'localName': 'AbstractDQ_Element', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'valueFound': $propertyFound/text(), 'allowedValues': string-join( $codes, ', ') }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
Test assertion for a condition with the following information:
Name: aaaasdasd
Description: asdas
Subconditions:
- IF MD_Metadata.identificationInfo.choice.MD_DataIdentification.descriptiveKeywords.MD_Keywords.keyword.choice.CharacterString IS 'inspireidentifiziert'
THEN MD_Metadata.identificationInfo.choice.MD_DataIdentification.language.choice.CharacterString IS 'ger'
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages0 := (for $record in $db let $ifPropertyCount := count($record//*[local-name()='MD_Metadata' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='identificationInfo' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='MD_DataIdentification' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='descriptiveKeywords' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='MD_Keywords' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='keyword' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='CharacterString' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco' and text()='inspireidentifiziert']) let $thenPropertyCount := count($record//*[local-name()='MD_Metadata' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='identificationInfo' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='MD_DataIdentification' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='language' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='CharacterString' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco' and text()='ger']) return if ($ifPropertyCount gt $thenPropertyCount) then local:addMessage('TR.conditionNotMatchingValue', map { 'localName': 'CharacterString', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco', 'expectedValue': 'ger' }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] let $messages := ($messages0) return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)
